mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT(A.DR_NO), A.HP_NO, A.DR_NAME, A.DR_EMAIL ,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HPLIKE G WHERE G.DR_NO = A.DR_NO) AS "DR_LIKE" ,A.DR_DISLIKE ,B.PRO_NO, B.PRO_RENAME ,C.HP_NAME, C.HP_POSTCODE, C.HP_ADDRESS ,E.HPCATE_NAME ,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ASKDRREPLY R WHERE A.DR_NO = R.DR_NO AND R.ADR_CHOOSESTATUS = 'Y') AS "CHOOSECOUNT" ,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ASKDRREPLY R WHERE A.DR_NO = R.DR_NO) AS "ANSWERCOUNT" ,TRUNC( ((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ASKDRREPLY R WHERE A.DR_NO = R.DR_NO AND R.ADR_CHOOSESTATUS = 'Y') / DECODE((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ASKDRREPLY R WHERE A.DR_NO = R.DR_NO), 0, 1, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ASKDRREPLY R WHERE A.DR_NO = R.DR_NO))) * 100 , 0) AS "CHOOSEPER" FROM ( SELECT * FROM DRCLIENT WHERE DR_NAME LIKE '%' || #{drName} || '%' ) A LEFT JOIN PROFILEPHOTO B ON A.DR_NO = B.DR_NO JOIN HOSPITAL C ON A.HP_NO = C.HP_NO JOIN HPLIST D ON C.HP_NO = D.HP_NO JOIN HPCATEGORY E ON A.HPCATE_CODE = E.HPCATE_CODE LEFT JOIN ASKDRREPLY F ON A.DR_NO = F.DR_NO WHERE DR_APPROVAL = 'Y' AND E.HPCATE_CODE = A.HPCATE_CODE ORDER BY "CHOOSEPER" DESC

SELECT AD.AD_NO, AD.AD_TITLE, C.C_NICKNAME, AD.AD_HEIGHT, AD.AD_WEIGHT, AD.AD_AGE, AD.AD_GENDER, AD.AD_CAUTION, AD.AD_SYMPTOM, AD.AD_CHOOSESTATUS, AD.HP_CATE_CODE, COUNT(ADP.ADP_NO) AS FILECOUNT, COUNT(ADR.ADR_NO) AS REPLYCOUNT FROM ASKDR AD JOIN CLIENT C ON (AD.C_NO = C.C_NO) LEFT JOIN ASKDRPHOTO ADP ON (AD.AD_NO = ADP.AD_NO) LEFT JOIN ASKDRREPLY ADR ON (AD.AD_NO = ADR.AD_NO) WHERE AD.AD_NO = #{bNo} AND AD.HP_CATE_CODE = #{category} GROUP BY ( AD.AD_NO, AD.AD_TITLE, C.C_NICKNAME, AD.AD_HEIGHT, AD.AD_WEIGHT, AD.AD_AGE, AD.AD_GENDER, AD.AD_CAUTION, AD.AD_SYMPTOM, AD.AD_CHOOSESTATUS, AD.HP_CATE_CODE)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ASKDR VALUES ( SEQ_ASKDRNO.NEXTVAL, #{bTitle}, SYSDATE, #{height}, #{weight}, #{age}, #{gender}, #{caution}, #{symptoms}, 'N', #{categoryNo}, #{memberNo}, 0 )
mapper.select: SELECT AD.AD_NO, AD.AD_TITLE, C.C_NICKNAME, AD.AD_HEIGHT, AD.AD_WEIGHT, AD.AD_AGE, AD.AD_GENDER, AD.AD_CAUTION, AD.AD_SYMPTOM, AD.HP_CATE_CODE, COUNT(ADP.ADP_NO) AS FILECOUNT FROM ASKDR AD JOIN CLIENT C ON (AD.C_NO = C.C_NO) LEFT JOIN ASKDRPHOTO ADP ON (AD.AD_NO = ADP.AD_NO) WHERE AD.AD_NO = #{bNo} GROUP BY (AD.AD_NO, AD.AD_TITLE, C.C_NICKNAME, AD.AD_HEIGHT, AD.AD_WEIGHT, AD.AD_AGE, AD.AD_GENDER, AD.AD_CAUTION, AD.AD_SYMPTOM, AD.HP_CATE_CODE)

SELECT PP.PRO_RENAME, DR.DR_NO, DR.DR_NAME, ADR.ADR_NO, ADR.ADR_CONTENT, ADR.ADR_REPLYDATE, ADR.ADR_CHOOSESTATUS, DR.HP_NO, H.HP_NAME FROM ASKDRREPLY ADR LEFT JOIN DRCLIENT DR ON ( DR.DR_NO = ADR.DR_NO ) LEFT JOIN PROFILEPHOTO PP ON ( DR.DR_NO = PP.DR_NO ) LEFT JOIN HOSPITAL H ON ( DR.HP_NO = H.HP_NO ) WHERE ADR.AD_NO = #{bNo} ORDER BY ADR.ADR_REPLYDATE ASC

SELECT ROWNUM AS RNO, A.* FROM (SELECT A.AD_NO, A.AD_TITLE, C.DR_NO, C.DR_NAME, A.AD_HEIGHT, A.AD_SUBMITDATE, A.AD_WEIGHT, A.AD_AGE, A.AD_GENDER, A.AD_CAUTION, A.AD_SYMPTOM, A.HP_CATE_CODE, D.HPCATE_NAME, B.ADR_CONTENT, B.ADR_REPLYDATE FROM ASKDR A JOIN ASKDRREPLY B ON A.AD_NO = B.AD_NO JOIN DRCLIENT C ON B.DR_NO = C.DR_NO JOIN HPCATEGORY D ON A.HP_CATE_CODE = D.HPCATE_CODE WHERE A.AD_CHOOSESTATUS = 'Y' AND B.ADR_CHOOSESTATUS = 'Y' AND A.C_NO = #{cNo} ORDER BY A.AD_SUBMITDATE DESC) A

SELECT ROWNUM AS RNO, A.* FROM (SELECT A.AD_NO, B.HPCATE_NAME, A.AD_TITLE, A.AD_SUBMITDATE, A.HP_CATE_CODE FROM ASKDR A JOIN HPCATEGORY B ON A.HP_CATE_CODE = B.HPCATE_CODE WHERE A.C_NO = #{cNo} AND AD_CHOOSESTATUS = 'N' ORDER BY A.AD_SUBMITDATE DESC) A
